name: Snekklr
description:
Snekklr

Physicsy snakes chompin each other. Made for LD34 themes: grow/2 button

Left, Right to turn. Hold down both two open jaws and go forwards.

LD Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
